channel.title: Getting npcs to talk and make pnpc command for everyone?
channel.description:
I used that news paper man tutorial and put everything in no errors but when I try to talk to the lumbridge guide nothing happens :confused: im using testscape and the only npcs that talk are bankers and horvik :(
and i tried making ::pnpc command for everyone i did this and it didnt work :mad:
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pnpc") && playerRights >= 0)[br][size=1]Posted at: August 08, 2006, 09:34:09 PM[/size][hr]bump..and im not sure if pnpc is the 1 where it makes u turn into a npc

item.title: Getting npcs to talk and make pnpc command for everyone?
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 0)
change it to:
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pnpc”))
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 09, 2006, 02:14:45 PM[/size][hr]typr ::pnpc #(the number of the monster you want to turn into)

Read full topic
